main.utils

Class WordNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.utils.WordNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<WordNode>

    public class WordNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<WordNode>, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents an object to be stored in the node of a word tree. A WordNode contains a word, the line numbers where it occurs, and the filenames it occurs in. WordNode implements Comparable and Serializable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
